data.title: It gets pretty busy so you may want to plan ahead
data.text: I always order the Leticia - delish bun and juicy tasty burgers.  Compliment it with a cold beer if you are able.  The place is pretty small even with the patio seating. We dont arrive after 11:30 for weekday lunch. Parking can also be tough. There's a small lot directly behind - if it happens to be a time Clovis is doing a parade or street fair/farmers market it can be even more complicated. Definitely worth it - just plan ahead a bit. If you don't mind a short walk there's also the lot just East of Clovis Ave behind Rev's that might have open spaces.

data.title: Excellent Hamburgers and relaxed atmosphere
data.text: Whether you're in the mood for an excellent hamburger, or you can't make up your mind what to eat and you want to try a different place, try the House of JuJu. Great food, great atmosphere and reasonable prices. You'll want to come back to try something else on the menu!

data.title: Food was fabulous. acoustics inside are horrible.
data.text: We're from out of town just stumbled across this place. They has a nice patio area so we went in. There were no tables available outside but there were plenty of tables inside. But the acoustics are so bad we could not eat in there. They said that we could wait for a table outside and it shouldn't be too long. It turned out to be longer than we hoped for. But the Blu Burger was amazing. We would definitely go back again, but only if we can eat outside.

data.title: Relaxed Environment!
data.text:
nice outdoor patio, great relaxed environment with super service and food. Bar tender very knowledgeable on the " draft craft beer" selection.

Not rushed, just the right amount of attention given. 

Wonderful Dessert and coffee to finish up!

data.title: Happy Taste Buds
data.text: We were not sure what to expect when House of JuJu first opened, since the location had previously housed  Mexican and Hot Dog restaurants.  We were delightfully surprised.  The food is fresh, delicious and served by great staff.  The menu has a nice mix of hamburgers and salads, and their sides are in a category by themselves.  My husband especially liked the chili, which he even orders in the summer, which is hot in Clovis.  We often take guests there for a fun meal and they are equally pleased.

data.title: Best burgers in Clovis
data.text: We love this place! Great service and fantastic burgers this place never disappoints. The potatoes and garlic dipping sauce are yummy! You will love this place for sure!

data.title: Fabulous every time!
data.text: Never disappointing.  Great chili, best burgers and I especially love the burger in a bowl (burger salad - sounds funny but it's awesome!).  Homemade desserts that are awesome:)

data.title: burgers
data.text: Heard great things about House of JuJu, but I thought it was ok. Rather get my burger elsewhere. Atmosphere was nice.

data.title: Excellent food, highly recommended
data.text:
Small place, great service and super great food for low prices. 
If you're not sure what you want to eat, take the sliders!!! Delicious 3 small burgers.
Highly recommended!

data.title: Amazing Burgers
data.text: I was very surprised with the burgers from this play , the burgers are like nothing I've ever tasted and I would recommend this place to every one . The potatoes they survey are Great with any dipping sauce

data.title: Went to heaven while eating the Athena Greek Salad
data.text: The Athena Greek Salad is such a delicious combination of leafy greens, chopped artichokes, shredded carrots, chopped tomatoes, feta and topped with a delicious kalamata olive dressing that you will want to come in and have it again and again. As a matter of fact, I had it two nights in a row. Order without croutons to be gluten free. The hamburgers are delicious as well.

data.title: NOT JUST BURGERS
data.text: Their burgers are fantastic evening. The menu doesn't stop there. Give it a try and you will lov it.

data.title: Great food, fun atmosphere
data.text: Gotta love a small town, family owned business! The food is good, and the service is always friendly. Try the potatoes! They're amazing!

data.title: YUM
data.text: Get the sliders! Three mini burgers (and you can mix and match flavors!) because they are amazing and they let you try a variety of flavors if you can't pick just one.  My personal favorite is JuJu Blue Burger.  I would also recommend the Sangria (we got pomegranate) which you can get a pitcher of.

data.title: Outstanding burgers!
data.text:
Great restaurant, with a great atmosphere. 
There are so many great burgers that you must try the trio of sliders so that you can taste as many as possible.

data.title: GREAT food!
data.text: Quaint local restaurant with delicious gourmet burgers and good service. They offer a nice beer variety and good happy hour deals. I recommend this place as a nice alternative to your average burger joint.

data.title: Fantastic Food
data.text: Simple traditional food with a wonderful twist.    Small Bar & Grill, patio seating, nicely tucked away local favorite.

data.title: Ordered a Letecia with steak and the steak was overcooked.
data.text:
I was in Clovis for job training and the girls from the office raved about House of JuJu for lunch. We ordered for pick-up and I ordered a Letecia Salad with steak because of how delicious it looked on the website. The salad was flavorful but the steak was way too overcooked and looked like it was from the day before or earlier. It was previously cooked, dry and tough. 

Needless to say, I was very disappointed, especially since I did not see it until we got back to the office. If I had been served that in house I would have sent it back but since I was already back at the office it was too much of a hassle.

data.title: Cozy and friendly
data.text: Enjoyed our meal....not a full menu but burgers, sandwiches and salads.  Good beer and wine selections.  Friendly service and quiet enough to talk to each other!

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: I live near here so I've enjoyed HOJJ several times.  Always a great experience! I usually go with a burger and beer.  Salad is good too. Happy every time.  Nice small patio for outside dining when the weather is right.
